entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Deux-Montagnes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow or freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight then changing to periods of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
